special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics).
descriptions: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

descriptions.raw: At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)

descriptions.raw: 3/day each: feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3/day each: feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield

special_abilities.name: Psychic Defense.
descriptions: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack.
